document.full_text: american phil mickelson signaled he was ready to defend his u.s. masters title by snapping a year-long victory drought with a three-shot win at the houston open on sunday.
document.title: mickelson snaps drought by winning masters tuneup
lines_and_colors: american phil mickelson signaled he was ready to defend his u.s. masters title by snapping a year-long victory drought with a three-shot win at the houston open on sunday.
